messages.subject: Maybe someone here will know
messages.msgSnippet: About two weeks ago I was looking up different words on Jim Breen s WWWJDic and through the google images link I found a Japanese site that had hachimaki with
messages.messageBody:
About two weeks ago I was looking up different words on Jim Breen's
WWWJDic and through the google images link I found a Japanese site
that had hachimaki with the metal bar on them and the makoto kanji. I
thought I bookmarked it, but apparently I didn't. Does anyone know of
any sites that have such hachimaki (aside from the anime cosplay
sites)? I've tried duplicating my search to no avail.

Thanks.
